import React from 'react' import Header from './Header'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./CoursePage.css"; import initialDetails from "../data/courseinfo"; import ReviewCard from './ReviewCard'; import { Margin } from '@mui/icons-material'; import reviews from '../data/coursereviews'; function CoursePage() { const {state} = useLocation(); const {name,id} = state; return (

{initialDetails[id-1].course_title}

{name}

Contents:

{initialDetails[id-1].content}

Course Instructors:

Nilesh Bhadve (2020-21)

Kantesh Balani(2019-20)

Somnath Bhowmick(2018-19)

Course Reviews-

) } export default CoursePage
